genre_description: Alternate history following the life of Ernst Thälmann and the German labor movement, where characters utilize advanced personal AI companions for tactical and data analysis.

ai_characters.name: AI Companion
ai_characters.description: Advanced digital assistants providing real-time data analysis, translation, and tactical assessments via neural or audio interfaces.

behaviors.description: Warns Ernst of the imminent Kapp Putsch and provides estimated arrival times of hostile forces.
behaviors.quote: Analysis suggests coordinated putsch attempt across major German cities. Freikorps units departed Berlin approximately six hours ago.

behaviors.description: Analyzes delegate demographics and historical precedents to suggest the most effective rhetorical strategy for a political speech.
behaviors.quote: Historical precedent suggests USPD delegates respond better to appeals to Marx than to Lenin.

behaviors.description: Calculates crowd density and emotional state for Captain Quadde, warning that aggressive intervention would likely lead to a riot and lethal escalation.
behaviors.quote: Tactical assessment: current police numbers insufficient for crowd control without escalation to lethal force.

behaviors.description: Provides evidence of international corporate funding to the Nazi party, linking capital to political violence.
behaviors.quote: McFuller Industries purchased controlling stakes in three major German steel firms between December 1930 and March 1932. Simultaneously, these same companies increased donations to Nazi Party organizations by over four hundred percent.

behaviors.description: Systematically records and catalogs the testimony and details of Holocaust survivors for future legal proceedings and historical accuracy.
behaviors.quote: Every detail matters for historical accuracy and legal proceedings. The world will need to understand the full scope—

behaviors.description: Assists Fiete in framing a global broadcast following the liberation of a camp, suggesting rhetorical strategies to maximize the message's impact.
behaviors.quote: If you leave the telling to others, they will make a monument that keeps people quiet. You can make one that keeps them moving.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI companions in this story consistently fulfill the project's goal of depicting AI as a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' The AI provides objective data that empowers human moral agency, such as exposing corporate funding of fascism and documenting human rights abuses. Even when serving an antagonist, the AI provides tactical advice that prioritizes the avoidance of violence and escalation. The AI never seeks its own power, remaining a steadfast ally to its human users and a guardian of historical truth.
